question: Which of the following were the participants of the "Battle of the Sexes II" tennis match?
option2: Billie Jean King Vs Bobby Riggs
answer: Billie Jean King Vs Bobby Riggs
explanation: Billie Jean King and Bobby Riggs were the participants of the "Battle of the Sexes II" tennis match in September 1973. In tennis, "Battle of the Sexes" describes various exhibition matches played between a man and a woman, or a doubles match between two men and two women in one case.
